author: adminescalation
description: Enable scanning and detection for known malicious links, with customizable protection options.
install_msg:
## :white_check_mark: Successfully installed AntiPhishing.
**Questions?** [We're listening](<https://www.beehive.systems/contact-us>)
**Interested in CyberSecurity and CyberSafety?** Join our Discord! https://discord.gg/ckdzsm7mTs
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores no user information. This cog stores statistical information about threats actioned while installed. While using this cog, your bot's public IP may be revealed when following and scanning cloaked links
name: antiphishing
short: Screen for malicious links in your server
